name: Gerkovink.GitHub.io
body:
###About me
Hi. I am a young researcher with a passion for teaching. I aim to be at the cutting edge of both teaching and research and have an interest in new developments concerning the presentation of data, results and knowledge. I have a specific interest for incomplete data problems, optimization and programming. I do my work at Utrecht University (Utrecht, Netherlands) and Columbia University (New York, USA).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
